website_summaries.verdict: The $200 CTL Chromebook J2 is a very good laptop for classrooms, and if the performance offered by this Rockchip-based model is any indication, it's the first of an affordable yet capable breed.
pros: Zippy performance, thanks to Rockchip RK3288-C processor
Comes with 100GB of Google Drive storage, and other extras for teachers and educators

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is amazing!! It out performs my last laptop in every way, and the battery life is excellent! This Chromebook is perfect for school and I am beyond satisfied with it's performance. I absolutely love the simplicity of this laptop and it's light enough to carry around. Although, you have to have some kind of internet connection to take full advantage of the Chromebook and it may be a difficult transition for people who like Windows, because the Chromebook runs on Chrome OS. Meaning no easy "my computer" or "my files", everything is done through your google account (drive) or the cloud. Something that Windows lovers won't really appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: E.V.

customer_reviews.title: Exterior is as nice as more expensive Chromebooks
customer_reviews.text: Solid Chromebook. Exterior is as nice as more expensive Chromebooks. Other than that, it's typical Chromebook experience. My son has used it HARD for school and pleasure for several months, and it's been perfect. Only quibble is that the speakers are pretty awful, but we use headphones or external Bluetooth speakers if watching video/music (or connect to TV via HDMI cable) -- so it doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No problems with the laptop. It does take some ...
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the laptop. It does take some getting use to the chrome programming as I'm use to Windows. But I bought this for my son. Didn't cost a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: angela guillory

customer_reviews.title: great little machine
customer_reviews.text: this computer does just what i need it to do - it's lightweight, quick processing - I have watched movies on it, plus doing regular work - I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a timely manner, protected well enough to be free from damage. It works exactly as advertised, and I am getting exactly the use out of it that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: hannah wallen

customer_reviews.title: Great price for product exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. As some reviews note online, the screen quality isn't great if you're off to the side or above the person using it. But for the price and our planned use? I think it's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook is invaluable
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive chromebook arrived quickly, and was very easy to set up. The boot and restart times are ludicrously fast compared to my desktop. My time on a desktop has shrunk to a couple of hours per week. I strongly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 13 year old son, he was over the moon. Lightweight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for Christmas because she was always asking to use my laptop. This is perfect for her...she can go online, play her learning games, and watch Youtube. It's very sturdy and was extremely easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney E. Koons

customer_reviews.title: but very pleased with the rest
customer_reviews.text: Battery life isn't stellar, but very pleased with the rest.
customer_reviews.author: R. Magill

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size and the ease of using it right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph keller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: just what my granddaughter needed and she is very happy with the chromebook
customer_reviews.author: mac harris

customer_reviews.title: Won't wake up.
customer_reviews.text: Was great but didn't last even two months. Stopped coming out of sleep mode. Tried some tricks I found online to no avail, and can't figure out how to remove the battery without breaking it. Wish there was some CTL online support but I found none.
customer_reviews.author: E. Urrutia

customer_reviews.title: There is a slight learning curve not as easy to use as my laptop with windows/7
customer_reviews.text: First time using a Chromebook. There is a slight learning curve not as easy to use as my laptop with windows/7. It is very small, screen is small, having to practically put it under my chin to see. Very lightweight so it is easy to carry around in my purse. Printing is so complicated that I still have not been able to print anything after having it for over 6 months. I have to e-mail it to myself on my 10 year old windows laptop to print! It is very fast and have not noticed any slowing down even with 5 or 6 tabs open.
customer_reviews.author: kidzpta

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Key board doesn't light up and doesn't connect to printers well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If all you want to do is very basic stuff then this will work. I found I cannot use it for Adobe, gamehouse and many many other programs. Even the options for games is severly lacking. I def. DO NOT reccomend a Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cozad

customer_reviews.title: Limited to Google!
customer_reviews.text: Can only operate with google apps; unable to use any microsoft products-Word etc. and can't access any conferencing apps.
customer_reviews.author: sam64

customer_reviews.title: Laptop bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a bad laptop only business and you cant rest it so i returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CTL 11.6" Chromebook J2, 2 GB RAM, 16 GB SSD, Black (NBCJ2)
product_meta.description: The ctl Chromebook J2 a powerful and cost-effective device for students and teachers. It features a rugged design and powerful processor. This is a high-performance processor, that supports high resolution display output and boasts HDMI 2.0, allowing students to power through tasks with efficiency.
feature_bullets: Powerful Quad Core ARM Cortex-A17 (RK3288-C) processor with up to 1.8GHz. This is a high performance processor that supports up to 3840 x 2160 output for external display and boasts HDMI 2.0.
Rugged design is ideal for the rigors of student use.
Sleek, lightweight design. At only 2.4 lbs., the CTL J2 Chromebook is about 20% lighter than other popular Chromebook models.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars35 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
